channel.title: TiDB in Kubernetes Documentation on SQL at Scale
channel.description: Recent content in TiDB in Kubernetes Documentation on SQL at Scale

item.description: Change Request This repository is ONLY used to solve issues related to TiDB Operator documentation. For other issues (related to TiDB, PD, etc), please move to other repositories. Please answer the following questions before submitting your issue. Thanks! Describe what you find is inappropriate or missing in the existing docs. Describe your suggestion or addition. Provide some reference materials (documents, websites, etc) if you could.

Error Report This repository is ONLY used to solve issues related to TiDB Operator documentation. For other issues (related to TiDB, PD, etc), please move to other repositories. Please answer the following questions before submitting your issue. Thanks! What is the URL/path of the document related to this issue? How would you like to improve it?

Which TiDB Operator version(s) do your changes apply to? (Required) master (the latest development version) v1.1 (TiDB Operator 1.1 versions) v1.0 (TiDB Operator 1.0 versions) What is the related PR or file link(s)? This PR is translated from: Other reference link(s):

Question This repository is ONLY used to solve issues related to TiDB Operator documentation. For other issues (related to TiDB, PD, etc), please move to other repositories. Before submitting your question, make sure you have: Searched existing Stack Overflow questions. Googled your question. Read the documentation: TiDB Operator (en) TiDB Operator (zh) Now, please describe your question here:

TiDB in Kubernetes Documentation This repository stores all the source files of TiDB in Kubernetes documentation at the PingCAP website. That is, the documentation for TiDB Operator. en: documentation in English zh: documentation in Chinese Documentation versions Currently, we maintain the following versions for TiDB in Kubernetes documentation, each with a separate branch: Branch name Version description master the latest development version release-1.

TiDB in Kubernetes Documentation TOC Introduction Overview TiDB Operator v1.1 Notice Get Started kind GKE Minikube Deploy Deploy TiDB Cluster On AWS EKS On GCP GKE On Alibaba Cloud ACK On Self-managed Kubernetes Prerequisites Configure Storage Class Deploy TiDB Operator Configure Resource and Disaster Recovery Configure TiDB Cluster Using TidbCluster Deploy TiDB Cluster Initialize TiDB Cluster Access TiDB Cluster Deploy TiFlash Deploy TiCDC Deploy TiDB Binlog Deploy Monitoring Monitor Kubernetes and TiDB Cluster Monitor TiDB Cluster Using TidbMonitor Access TiDB Dashboard Secure Enable TLS for the MySQL Client Enable TLS between TiDB Components Operate Upgrade TiDB Cluster Upgrade TiDB Operator Scale TiDB Cluster Manually Scale Automatically Scale Backup and Restore Use Helm Charts Use CRDs Back up Data to GCS Using Mydumper Restore Data from GCS Using TiDB Lightning Back up Data to S3-Compatible Storage Using Mydumper Restore Data from S3-Compatible Storage Using TiDB Lightning Back up Data to S3-Compatible Storage Using BR Restore Data from S3-Compatible Storage Using BR Restart a TiDB Cluster Maintain a Kubernetes Node Collect TiDB Logs Enable Automatic Failover Recover the PD Cluster Destroy a TiDB Cluster Import Data Troubleshoot FAQs Reference Architecture TiDB Scheduler Advanced StatefulSet Controller Admission Controller Sysbench Performance Test API References Tools tkctl TiDB Toolkit Configure Configure tidb-drainer Chart Configure tidb-cluster Chart Configure tidb-backup Chart
